title: The Biden-Trump Presidential Debate
content: JAKE TAPPER, CNN MODERATOR: Weï¿½re live from Georgia, a key battleground state in the race for the White House. In just moments, the current U.S. president will debate the former U.S. president as their partiesï¿½ presumptive nominees, a first in American history. We want to welcome our viewers in the United States and around the world to our studios in Atlanta. This is the CNN presidential debate. DANA BASH, CNN MODERATOR: This debate is being produced by CNN and itï¿½s coming to you live on CNN, CNN International, CNN.com, CNN Max, and CNN Espanol.
